flavorText:
"Only the lion knows more stories than I do."
—Chulane, Teller of Tales

foreignData.flavorText:
„Nur der Löwe kennt mehr Geschichten als ich."
—Chulane der Geschichtenerzähler
foreignData.name: Hüter der Fabeln
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine oder mehrere Nicht-Mensch-Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügen, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Solo el león sabe más historias que yo".
—Chulane, cuentacuentos
foreignData.name: Custodio de las fábulas
foreignData.text: Siempre que una o más criaturas que no sean Humano que controlas hagan daño de combate a un jugador, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Seul le lion connaît plus d'histoires que moi. »
—Chulane, conteur de fables
foreignData.name: Gardien des fables
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'au moins une créature non-Humain que vous contrôlez inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Solo il leone conosce più storie di me."
—Chulene, Narratore di Racconti
foreignData.name: Custode delle Fiabe
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta una o più creature non Umano che controlli infliggono danno da combattimento a un giocatore, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「獅子だけが、私よりも多くの物語を知っている。」
――伝承の語り部、チュレイン
foreignData.name: 寓話の守り手
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールしていて人間でないクリーチャー１体以上がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Só o leão conhece mais histórias do que eu."
— Chulane, Narrador de Contos
foreignData.name: Guardião das Fábulas
foreignData.text: Toda vez que uma ou mais criaturas que você controla que não sejam do tipo Humano causarem dano de combate a um jogador, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Один лишь лев знает больше историй, чем я».
— сказочник Чулейн
foreignData.name: Хранитель Сказок
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда одно или несколько не являющихся Человеком существ под вашим контролем наносят боевые повреждения игроку, возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText:
「只有那头狮子知道的故事比我多。」
～说书人楚兰
foreignData.name: 寓言守护兽
foreignData.text: 每当一个或数个由你操控的非人类生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

name: Keeper of Fables
originalText: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

rulings.text: If non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to two or more players at the same time, Keeper of Fables's ability triggers for each of those players.
Keeper of Fables's ability triggers even if it's dealt lethal damage at the same time that non-Humans you control deal combat damage to a player.

Because creatures with first strike deal combat damage before creatures without first strike, Keeper of Fables's ability can trigger twice during one combat if your creatures deal combat damage to one player at different times.

text: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
